game.name: Fire Dragon Adventure
game.description:
A real adventure is just going to begin right now right here! Are you ready to accept various dangers and challenges that you have not witnessed ever? Join Fire Dragon Adventure and show the world that you are a true fan of dragon games that offer matchless thrill and fun! Earlier heroes had to deal with lots of problems when they embarked on their adventure. It was common for them to struggle against different types of dangerous monsters. However, you have to experience the same in this free online platform game.?
Get ready to take control of two characters with your friend in a divided screen! Come forward and defeat all your enemies through different levels using your fire and sword! Do not forget to gather precious coins, stones, golds and treasures that you see on the screen! There are different 16 levels to play online for free here in this cool HTML5 game. Start it with the first level and then unlock the further levels by clearing the first one! It is up to you whether you want to play either solo or with your friend.?
The boards will show you the question marks for tips. The middle of the screen will show you the health bars through which you can get an idea about your health. Here you will also learn about the coins you have collected so far. Grab the special icon to allow your dragon fly in the sky in this one of the popular platformer games! Collect all the icons and get a chance to unlock the gate as fast as you can! Common! Fight hard against the blood-thirsty dragons to be one of the mythical beasts! Browse more dinosaur games on our free online game website!
